name: The Great Giana 3D
description: How would the world look from the eyes of Giana? Find out here in The Great Giana 3D (jumper?). Just a fun little project, I always wondered how it would look, and now I know. It's just level 1 made rather quick. There may be updates, there may not  :) The music is my remake of the Great Giana Sisters Intro Theme, originally by Chris Hülsbeck.
